# Chat in your source code

Fields match Mastodon's schema, more or less.


## Support new tags:
- CHAT/DISCUSSION
- POST/COMMENT
- QUESTION/ANSWER

## Formats
- Website
- HTML
- Plain text

## Sync with Mastodon
Periodically, if you have the API keys for each person on the team, you can post new comments.

## RSS
And generate RSS.
